snippet: Viacom's Nickelodeon has been No. 1 pretty much forever among children ages 2 to 11, but Disney Channel has been gaining.
abstract: Viacom's Nickelodeon has been No. 1 pretty much forever among children ages 2 to 11, but Disney Channel has been gaining.

headline.main: At 'Upfronts' for Children's TV, It's Viacom vs. Surging Disney
